name: Critical Damage
description:
Fascinating and entertaining space action game. Simple and clear management. More than 90 kinds of enemies and twelve kinds of weapons.
10 unique locations.
5 kinds of robots under control of the player.
12 kinds of the weapon improved by the player, Including mines and automatic Guns.
Features:
-Real action game;
-Modern 3D graphics;
-Extraordinarily addictive game play;
-Unique power-ups;
-Gorgeous effects, huge explosions!
-Original soundtrack and powerful sound effects;
-Game statistics;
